item.title: Population growth and Doubling times with tidyverse
item.description: Roses are red, violets are blue This is a forced rhyme, hereâ€™s blog post two! Background Ever since I worked on data about populations at my internship at Perscio, a healthcare data analysis firm in Indianapolis, as well as worked with a Professor of Demography and Social Policy on a paper about demographic data, I have gained interest in population problems - mostly through readings. The best way to restart this journey would be to do so using what population problems often involve: Data analysis.
